text:
@SpeakerPelosi How about this misinformation  you were saying on February 24th that we all should not have any concerns over the coronavirus.
People went out and traveled, including me, from Hawaii to NC and to NY to visit family and friends.
Told it was safe to do so.

https://t.co/LpbdVPxyCk
